game.title: Memory Match!
game.performanceNote: Lura: Ya kamata a nemi shawarar ma'aikacin lafiya.
game.setupSubtitle: Wannan gwajin yana amfani da ƙwaƙwalwar sauti don tantance aikin kwakwalwa. Da fatan a kasance tare da ma'aikacin lafiya.
game.setupDescription: Za ku ji jerin sauti daban-daban. Ku riƙe tsarin yadda kuka ji su sannan ku zaɓe su daidai.
game.selectPhase: Yanzu zaɓi sautin bi da bi
game.goodTry: Ƙoƙari mai kyau. Ci gaba da gwadawa!
game.alertMessage: Da fatan a kammala ko soke gwajin yanzu kafin a canza harshe.

about.title: Game da Wannan Aikin
about.projectGoalText: An tsara wannan kayan aikin ne don wuraren da ba su da wadataccen kayan aiki, musamman karkara da babu intanet sosai. Manhajar tana aiki ne a kan 'browser' kuma tana adana bayanai a cikin wayarka don sirri.
about.highlight1: Manhajar Yanar Gizo da ke aiki ba tare da intanet ba
about.highlight2: Adana bayanai a cikin waya don sirri
about.highlight3: Tsari mai sauƙi don wuraren da intanet ke da nauyi
about.highlight5: Tsarin da ya dace da wayar salula
